entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
